page.title: 15RELIGION-BASSALEG PARISH-2
page.content: Rhiwderin is part of the parish of St.Basil's,Bassaleg,but has it's own Tabernacle Congregational Church.Roman Catholic worshippers have a church in Rogerstone dedicated to St. Basil and St.Gwladys,a local saint who was mother of St.Woolos.Rogerstone also has a Pentecostal Church which is housed in a new building and attracts many young people.There are many organisations for young people which are supported by the local churches.Typical of these is the Bethel's Joyful Juniors,which is for children aged 5-11.They do drawing,then Mr.Edwards,the minister,reads a story from the Bible.Mrs.Reed plays the piano for them to sing songs.At the end Mrs. Edwards gives everyone a lolly then they all go home.
